appDesktop.descriptionHelp: Description will help you remember where this Desktop Apps Authentication is used.
appDesktop.empty: The Desktop Apps list is empty.
appDesktop.label: Desktop Applications
appDesktop.success: New Desktop App password enabled successfully. Passwords list has been updated.
appDesktop.title: Desktop Apps

appMobile.descriptionHelp: Description will help you remember where this Mobile Apps Authentication is used.
appMobile.empty: The Mobile Apps list is empty.
appMobile.label: Mobile Applications
appMobile.success: New Mobile App password enabled successfully. Passwords list has been updated.
appMobile.title: Mobile Apps

changePassword.formatNotValid: Password must contain at least one uppercase, a lowercase, a number and a special character
changePassword.instruction: Please create a new password and enter it in the confirmation field
changePassword.lowerUpper: an uppercase (ABC) and a lowercase (abc) character
changePassword.mustContain: The new password should be 6 to 20 characters and must contain:
changePassword.sameOldPassword: Your password cannot be the same as the old one.
changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.zimbraPasswordLocked: The password change is disabled, please contact your system administrator for further support.
changePassword.zimbraPasswordMinLowerCaseChars: Minimum amount of lower characters is {{num}}.
changePassword.zimbraPasswordMinNumericChars: Minimum amount of numeric characters is {{num}}.
changePassword.zimbraPasswordMinPunctuationChars: Minimum amount of special characters is {{num}}.
changePassword.zimbraPasswordMinUpperCaseChars: Minimum amount of upper case characters is {{num}}.

deleteOtp.description: All the devices that are using this password are going to be disconnected and they will not be able to authenticate until you provide a new credential set.

deletePassword.title: Are you sure you want to delete this password?

easAuth.empty: The Exchange ActiveSync list is empty.
easAuth.helpRemember: Description will help you remember where this Exchange ActiveSync Authentication is used.
easAuth.label: Exchange ActiveSync
easAuth.success: New Exchange ActiveSync password enabled successfully. Passwords list has been updated.

error.alreadyInUse: Already in use. Please choose another description.

instruction.changePassword: Here you can change your password.
instruction.desktop: Here you can manage Desktop App password.
instruction.eas: Here you can manage your Exchange ActiveSync password.
instruction.mobile: Here you can manage Mobile App password.
instruction.otp: Here you can manage the OTP Authentication.

newOtp.copy_token: Use this token to authenticate your Desktop Sync account.
newOtp.label: New OTP
newOtp.save_pin: We suggest to print and keep the PIN codes since they could be asked to authenticate; each PIN code can be used just once.
newOtp.scan_qr: Scan this QR code through one of the supported apps.
newOtp.warning: Warning: you'll be able to copy this token just once.

recoveryAddress.body_row1: Enter an email address to set as your recovery address.
recoveryAddress.body_row2: Clicking "Set Address" will initiate email verification. We'll send a confirmation email to the address you provide.
recoveryAddress.body_row3: Enter the validation code we sent to your email address.
recoveryAddress.body_row4: Didn't receive the code yet? Click "Resend Code".
recoveryAddress.status_verified_message: Your recovery address is set. You can easily update it from here.
recoveryAddress.title: Recovery Address

setNewOtpLabel.empty: The OTP Authentication list is empty.
setNewOtpLabel.labelPurpose: The label will help you remember where the OTP is used.
setNewOtpLabel.maxLength: The label maximum length is {{maxLength}} characters.
setNewOtpLabel.prohibitedCharacters: Don't use any special characters, accented characters nor spaces.
setNewOtpLabel.title: OTP Authentication

setNewPassword.textDescription: Use this code to authenticate your account on Exchange ActiveSync services
setNewPassword.warningJustOnce: Warning: you’ll be able to see this code just once

snackbar.validation_code_resent: Validation code has been resent to mail address
snackbar.validation_code_sent: Validation code has been sent to mail address

print.eraseUsedPin: Erase the used PIN from the list
print.keepInSafePlace: We recommend you keep the codes in a safe place.
print.title: OTP Codes
print.typePin: Insert one of the PIN codes listed above
print.useOnce: Keep in mind that each code can be used just once, so we suggest erasing it from the list once it is used. Whenever you’ll use a code, you are going to receive a notification e-mail.
print.whenToUse: These are your static codes. You will have to use one of the codes in case you won't have your mobile device to proceed with the authentication.
